Detailed Description

cvmx_uahc::_gtxfifosiz#

This register holds the internal RAM start address/depth of each TxFIFO implemented. Unless packet size/buffer size for each endpoint is different and application-specific, it is recommended that the software use the default value. One register per FIFO. One register per FIFO.

Reset values = 0:[0x0000_0082] 1:[0x0082_0103] 2:[0x0185_0205].

This register can be reset by IOI reset or with UCTL()_CTL[UAHC_RST].
